EmailTemplate.description: Use this template for SPEX order rejections
EmailTemplate.name: SPEX unlike exchange denial
EmailTemplate.subject: SPEX Unlike Exchange Denial
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are unable to book your order.
Your request cannot be processed as it falls outside the SPEX policy for unlike exchanges.
You can review the current SPEX policy on our MyAerospace Portal.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
